title: Play or Be Played What Every Female Should Know About Men, Datin
description:
Got Game?

It&#039;s a fact. Every woman needs game. Take Oprah, Jada Pinkett-Smith, and BeyoncÃƒÂ© Knowles. All three of these women have the one intangible quality that every mack, male or female, must possess: they all have game. In other words, they have intelligence, hustle, and common sense that they apply to every aspect of their lives -- especially in their relationships.
Play or Be Played is an instruction manual for women who are tired of being played by men and who want to be players themselves. Though women may not want to play games, the truth is men often do. So women who hope to win in the game of love must first learn the rules. Bestselling author and true mack, Tariq "K-Flex" Nasheed shares: 
ways to spot a scrub what it takes to get with a baller why men cheat how men really judge women the top three mistakes women make in relationships 
Street-smart and straightforward, Play or Be Played will help you get with a king without being a hoochie, groupie, or a chickenhead
